price: Mengapa kami tidak akan bertawakal kepada Allah padahal Dia telah menunjukkan jalan kepada kami dan kami sungguh-sungguh akan bersabar terhadap gangguan-gangguan yang kamu lakukan kepada kami.  Dan hanya kepada Allah saja orang-orang yang bertawakal itu berserah diri"
arabic: وَمَا لَنَآ أَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَقَدۡ هَدَىٰنَا سُبُلَنَاۚ وَلَنَصۡبِرَنَّ عَلَىٰ مَآ ءَاذَيۡتُمُونَاۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā lanā allā natawakkala ʿalā al-lahi waqad hadānā subulanā walanaṣbiranna ʿalā mā ādhaytumūnā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mutawakilūna
translations: And surely we will bear with patience
